Question
========
What is the power set of {London, Edinburgh, Dublin}?


Solution
========
{{London}, {Edinburgh}, {Dublin}, {London, Edinburgh}, {London, Dublin}, {Edinburgh, Dublin}, {London, Edinburgh, Dublin}, $\emptyset$}
